name: Bounty Buggy Brutal Battle
description:
Bounty Buggy Brutal Battle is a strategy bounty buggy game packed with fun-filled explosive action guaranteed to separate the men from the boys,women and girls.Your goal is to advance and destroy the opponent enemy before they attack and invade you. You need to use your expert knowledge of hard slams to take out these fearsome and extraordinary opponents.
Every time you destroy an enemy you earn points which you use to increase the strength and Every time an enemy hits you,your health is reduced.Once your health reaches zero, you are destroyed and the game is over.
And remember,make sure that no one gets left behind! for you and your men.There are different locations.
